rentalItems.name: Tractor
rentalItems.description: A powerful tractor for heavy-duty farm work. Comes with multiple attachments.

rentalItems.name: Combine Harvester
rentalItems.description: Efficiently harvest a variety of grain crops. Maintained and serviced regularly.

rentalItems.name: Organic Wheat Seeds
rentalItems.description: High-yield, non-GMO organic wheat seeds. Suitable for all soil types. Price per 10kg bag.

rentalItems.name: Natural Pesticide
rentalItems.description: Eco-friendly pesticide to protect your crops from common pests. Safe for organic farming. Price per 5L container.

rentalItems.name: Nitrogen Fertilizer
rentalItems.description: Rich nitrogen fertilizer to boost plant growth and yield. Price per 50kg bag.

rentalItems.name: Plow Attachment
rentalItems.description: Durable plow for tilling soil before planting. Attaches to most standard tractors.

rentalItems.name: Corn Seeds
rentalItems.description: High-quality corn seeds for a bountiful harvest. Resistant to common diseases. Price per 10kg bag.

rentalItems.name: Irrigation Sprinkler
rentalItems.description: Automated sprinkler system for efficient field irrigation. Covers a large area.
